titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning buildings in, and about London
Proclamations. 1624-07-14
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Theobalds the fourteenth day of Iuly, in the two and twentieth yeere of our reigne ... .
This state has arms with initials "I R" at top (arms 14); Steele notation: haue Imperiall pu-.
Reproduction of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (Early English books) and the British Library (Misc. Brit. tracts).
